item.title: Adroit Infotech Stock Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Market Rally
item.description: Adroit Infotech has reached a 52-week low, trading below all key moving averages, even as the broader market and sector indices show strength. The stock’s latest price reflects a significant decline over the past year, contrasting sharply with the positive momentum seen in the Sensex and the Computers - Software & Consulting sector. Time: 7 minutes ago
